items.title: Jim Cramer on Honeywell (HON): “Aerospace is the Growth Engine – I Own It!”
items.description: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Focused On These 9 Stocks Recently. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Honeywell (NASDAQ:HON) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discussed recently. Jim Cramer, host of Mad Money, expressed his frustration on March 19 about how investors often get caught […]
